price: 80. Et Loth, qui dit à son peuple : « Vous vous adonnez à un vice que nul autre aux mondes n’avait pratiqué avant vous !
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata mā sabaqakum bihā min aḥadin mina al-ʿālamīna
